EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_NY User Group_Q114.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: New York User Group Meeting is Tonight
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We look forward to seeing you for our New York User Group Meeting tonight, March 4, 2014. Here are the event details below:
- Date: Tuesday, March 4, 2013 - Time: 6:30PM (EST) - Location: Pivotal Office, 625 Avenue of the Americas, 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10011
Have questions? Email <mailto:info@gopivotal.com> us.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
